articles.title: Ashwin on retiring out: 'We're late, but this will happen a lot' - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: He believes T20 hasn't been "fully cracked yet" and retiring out "won't be a stigma like running someone out at the non-striker's end"

articles.title: IPL 2022: Meet Ishani, fashion designer wife of PBKS leg-spinner Rahul Chahar - Zee News
articles.description: Team India leg-spinner Rahul Chahar was bought by Punjab Kings for Rs 5.25 crore at the IPL 2022 mega auction in February this year. Chahar is currently the leading wicket-taker for PBKS in IPL 2022 with 7 wickets as he gets ready to face his former side Mumb…
articles.content: Rahul Chahar tied the knot with fiancee Ishani Johar, who is a fashion designer, in a destination wedding in Goa on March 9, 2022 ahead of IPL 2022. (Source: Twitter)
